headline: 3 Invesco Mutual Funds to Buy for Strong Returns
summary: Below, we share with you three Invesco mutual funds, namely MLPFX, VSRAX and ICSFX. Each has earned a Zacks Mutual Fund Rank #1.

headline: Invesco International Small-Mid Company Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: Class A shares underperformed the MSCI ACWI ex-US SMID Index and the Morningstar Foreign Small/Mid Growth peer group average for the fourth quarter and the full year.
